subject: Fix FTBFS on efl-1.11
commitMessage:
Fix FTBFS on efl-1.11

multiple programs of the same name, so it got confused
they were same name, different actions, names must be unique
or have no name then (u're anonymous and thus inheriting cant override your stuff anyway)

Without Error message is :

   edje_cc: Error. Unable to find program name "elm.text".

Author: rasterman
Change-Id: Ib2e84b54ce382cae10f9bec19d6a2eb1afdf24fb
Origin: https://phab.enlightenment.org/P74
Signed-off-by: Philippe Coval <philippe.coval@open.eurogiciel.org>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Verified-1

does build but does not get along the calc using efl-1.11

the patch just affects genlist widget... which you don't have in the calculator... so it's not this patch. there's something  else. either way this should go in so it builds - it was an actual theme problem with 2 programs of the same exact name and that basically made thinks fall apart (it's invalid to have 2 programs of the same name)

subject: PTREL-148: Fix build against Tizen 3.0 EFL packages
commitMessage:
PTREL-148: Fix build against Tizen 3.0 EFL packages

Remove Tizen 2.2 specific entries that break the build

Signed-off-by: Rusty Lynch <rusty.lynch@intel.com>

Rusty,

I agree with this patch but..
We need to be sync with 2.2, isn't it?

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

(1 comment)

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

the point here is that removing the tizen only options doesn't break build - it may affect functionality though, but this is a problem tizen is going to hit for 3.0 anyway as tizen has gone and forked efl, added features, not had those features vetted by upstream, and then tizen 3 has to upgrade, but can no longer just merge because tizen 2.x is such a long time fork that upstream code has changed so much, tizen has to either never update again, cause a full fork of efl (moving all developers to efl 1.7 and never again upgrading, and throwing away 1.5 years of upstream improvements), or to give up its changes and re-set with upstream code, so this is part of a reset.
Uploaded patch set 2.
Change has been successfully pushed.

Patch Set 2:

(1 comment)

all the proxy.source_clip properties are handled upstream these days, so they can all be removed.
